item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Here are some easy commands to edit.

Command to get XP (Change the “486000000” to the amount of XP you want, depends on your max level in your server)
The “2” is the player right who can use it, 3 = Owner, 2 = Admin, 1 =Player Moderator, 0 = Player

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("command-you-want") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("You receive some xp!"); }

Command to get Items.
(This gives you tons of party hats)
The first Number, for example 1039 is the item id, the 10000 is the amount you want.

else if (command.startsWith("phats") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(1039,10000); addItem(1041,10000); addItem(1043,10000); addItem(1045,10000); addItem(1047,10000); addItem(1049,10000); }

Read full topic
